2025-12-03JUSOther Than Statutory AuthorityAppointment of a Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec for the districts of Baie-Comeau and MinganAppointment of David Héroux of the city of Sept-Îles in the Province of Quebec, Barrister-at-law, to be a Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec for the districts of Baie-Comeau and Mingan, with residence in the territory of Ville de Baie-Comeau or the immediate vicinity thereof.N/A
subject: Appointment of a Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec for the districts of Baie-Comeau and Mingan
precis: Appointment of David Héroux of the city of Sept-Îles in the Province of Quebec, Barrister-at-law, to be a Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec for the districts of Baie-Comeau and Mingan, with residence in the territory of Ville de Baie-Comeau or the immediate vicinity thereof.
